限.definition: to limit; to restrict; (bound form) limit; bound

限免.definition: (of a product, service etc) free for a limited time (abbr. for 限時免費|限时免费[xian4shi2 mian3fei4])

限制.definition: to restrict; to limit; to confine; restriction; limit; CL:個|个[ge4]

限定詞.definition: determiner (in grammar, i.e. article, demonstrative, possessive pronoun, noun genitive etc)

限於.definition: to be limited to; to be confined to

限時.definition: to set a time limit; for a limited time; time-limited; limited period of time

限時信.definition: mail to be delivered by a specified time

限期.definition: to set a time limit; time limit; deadline

限流.definition: to limit the flow of passengers, customers or vehicles; to limit the spread of sensitive content; (electricity) current limiting; (computer networking) rate limiting

限行.definition: to restrict the use of motor vehicles (in a particular area)

限購.definition: to limit the amount a customer can buy

限額.definition: quota; limit (upper or lower); to set a quota; to set a limit
